title: This Insect
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: Insects vary widely in their shape, texture, and color. This Insect introduces students to the wonderful world of insects through brilliant photographs and simple text. The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast as well as to visualize to understand text.
reviewWords: beautiful, furry, insect, shiny, spotted, striped
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and Contrast
grammar: Capitalization                : Capitalize the beginning of sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word is and this
